name: Gluten-Free No-Bake Chocolate Pretzel Bites
description: Quick and easy pretzel sandwiches stuffed with a chocolate cream cheese filling.
recipeIngredient: 15 gluten-free chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Glutino)
about 48 bite-size gluten-free pretzels (such as Glutino)

recipeInstructions.text: In bowl of food processor, combine sandwich cookies and cream cheese. Run food processor until smooth, about 45 seconds, scraping down sides as necessary. Spread mixture on bite-size pretzel. Sandwich with another pretzel. Repeat until you use all the filling.
